text: Per Ståle Søderstrøm (born 20 April 1943) is a retired Norwegian handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Oslo and represented the club SK Arild. In 1972 he was part of the Norwegian team which finished ninth in the Olympic tournament. He played three matches. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Norway Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Per Søderstrøm
